definition: (of a woman) to adorn oneself/makeup/adornment/trousseau/stage makeup and costume

sentences.english: Small tables can be transformed into Shuzhuangtai, followed by the exquisite Shuzhuangjing side.
sentences.chinese: 小桌子可以改造成梳妆台，之后是一面玲珑的梳妆镜。

sentences.english: Two reliable sources of toys are dresser tops and wastebaskets. There are several types of cat toys.
sentences.chinese: 有两个可靠的玩具来源，分别是梳妆台上面和废纸篓。

sentences.english: There is a layer of dust on the dressing-table.
sentences.chinese: 梳妆台上盖着一层灰尘。

sentences.english: She also asked that her dresser be silver.
sentences.chinese: 把梳妆台涂成银色也是她主动要求的。

sentences.english: Chang E enters medicine Tibet the dressing table in hundred valuable chest, but unexpectedly is seen by loose Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 嫦娥将药藏进梳妆台的百宝匣里，不料被蓬蒙看到了。

sentences.english: On the countertop, add a neat stack of new white towels and scented reeds.
sentences.chinese: 在梳妆台面上，加上一打整洁的新白毛巾和芳香棒儿。

sentences.english: She went over to the dresser and struck a match, lighting the gas.
sentences.chinese: 她走到梳妆台前，划了根火柴，点亮了煤气灯。

sentences.english: There are many kinds of lotion on my dressing table.
sentences.chinese: 我的梳妆台上有各种各样的护肤液。

sentences.english: Gules coriaceous foot is filled up, dresser is the style of 40 time.
sentences.chinese: 红色的皮质脚垫，梳妆台是40年代的风格。

sentences.english: Next to that you had the small vanity and a towel rack.
sentences.chinese: 紧挨着的是一个小型的梳妆台和一个毛巾架。

sentences.english: There is a layer of dust on the dressing-table. Clean it before the guest arrives.
sentences.chinese: 梳妆台上盖着一层灰尘，在客人来之前，把它擦干净。

sentences.english: Myra got out of bed and lighted the lamp on her dressing table.
sentences.chinese: 迈拉走下床来，开亮了梳妆台上的灯。

sentences.english: Also, don't display lotions and creams on your dresser.
sentences.chinese: 而且，不要把洗液和乳霜摆在外面的你的梳妆台上。

sentences.english: She inspected the dressing-table for dust with her hand.
sentences.chinese: 她用手抹抹梳妆台，看看有没有灰尘。

sentences.english: The bedroom is small, but has a large closet and a full-sized dresser.
sentences.chinese: 卧室很小，但是有一个大衣柜和一个全尺寸的梳妆台。

sentences.english: She pulled herself unsteadily from the bed to the dresser.
sentences.chinese: 她颤巍巍地由床边挪到梳妆台前。
